extendedInfo.description: World of Dragons is a Multiplatform MMORPG Online (Massively Multiplayer). Download it for free and play it now! World of Dragons follows the big classics of MMORPG, where, besides playing in a huge virtual world, the player can find lots of options: races, classes, items, monsters, spells. Play with your friends and make new friends online. Become a part of this unique fantasy world.- Customizable characters- Evolve your character- Large environments- Long gameplay- Premium objects

reviews.title: Disregard this app
reviews.comment: The developer\'s website is down, as well as the registry servers, and the game website. So no new characters, and I don\'t believe you can play your old characters. This app is dead, and not worth your time. Looked promising though...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Your kidding right?
reviews.comment: The game wouldn\'t let me register, or connect to facebook! Good grapghics too. Unistalling.
reviews.author: Brandon Freeman

reviews.comment: Many bugs lol, no register and login -.- sry for this ask but this is a shittttttt :/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: I give it one star because it does more loading than playtime waited 30 minutes or more trying to play..picked up my phone and it drained my battery life from full to half a bar in just 30 minutes.....I will try to play it on my computer....uninstalling....this is bullshit....I can play jusfine on my husband iPhone....but I\'m blaming it on sprints connection.....it seems like it could be a good game....just two slow....fix that please if you can anyone....please email me if anyone has any suggestion....daic
reviews.author: DAITCHIE BOYD

reviews.title: Wasted time
